name: Sniper 3D - Hit Targets Shooting
description:
Select your favorite weapons from arsenal with different specs, go for gun attack or sniper strike for the aiming board.
You won’t be killing any person or animal in this first person shooting game. You will learn how to aim perfect with real time challenges.
Show your expert skills with assault rifle and modern sniper guns. You had to take bull’s-eye shots to move to next level, take aim and shoot with precision.
Select your favorite weapons and attack, hit moving and static targets for the beginner levels.
Limited bullets in this weapon simulator, so be precise before you take a shot.
Play one of the best gun simulator game which trigger excitement inside you. Start firing automatic carbine and especial firearm from inventory.

Superb 12 shooting levels to challenge your game play experience
6 actual weapons including deadly assault sniper rifle, light Machine guns and more to be added
Limited ammo to make the weapon simulator game more challenging and fun
Awesome realistic graphics for true action game & shooting experience in 3D simulator game
High definition 3D graphics with distinct outdoor location
Static, moving, bottles, and long range targets for your training

How to Play
Aim and smash the bottle and Aim
Be accurate while shooting
Accuracy will be tested in expert levels
Move left & right to shoot more bottles
Shoot to win
